enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2_CH1 pin is fed to FTM2 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2_CH1 pin XOR FTM2_CH0 XOR FTM1_CH1 pin is fed to FTM2 CH1 If this field is set, then the three input pins feed FTM2 channel 1 input capture. In this case, FTM1 channel 1 cannot be used for input capture of FTM1, as it has no pin. FTM1 channel1 can be used for Output Compare mode of FTM1, though without an output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM1 Ch0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM2 Ch0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM1 Ch0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM2 Ch0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is disabled on UART0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is enabled on UART0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is disabled on UART1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is enabled on UART1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0100
enumeratedValue.description: DMA channel 0 transfer last write complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0101
enumeratedValue.description: DMA channel 1 transfer last write complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0110
enumeratedValue.description: DMA channel 2 transfer last write complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: DMA channel 3 transfer last write complete

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pretrigger A for ADC0.\tClearing this field will result in ADHWTSA=1 and ADHWTSB=0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Pretrigger B for ADC0.\tSetting this bit will result in ADHWTSA=0 and ADHWTSB=1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Alternate Trigger Selected for ADC0 as defined by ADC0TRGSEL

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pretrigger A for ADC1.\tClearing this field will result in ADHWTSA=1 and ADHWTSB=0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Pretrigger B for ADC1.\tSetting this bit will result in ADHWTSA=0 and ADHWTSB=1

field.name: FTM0SYNCBIT
field.description: FTM0 Hardware Trigger 0 configure by software

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No effect to FTM0;\t this allow the hardware trigger options to function as expected. See SOPT4[FTM0TRG0SRC]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: If TRIG0 enabled, this refreshes the FTM0CNTIN and all buffered registers of the FTM0 (must write 0 first then write 1); this masks the hardware trigger

field.name: FTM1SYNCBIT
field.description: FTM1 Hardware Trigger 0 configure by software

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No effect to FTM1;\t this allows the hardware trigger options to function as expected. See SOPT4[FTM1TRG0SRC]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: If TRIG0 enabled, this refreshes the FTM1CNTIN and all buffered registers of the FTM1 (must write 0 first then write 1); this masks the hardware trigger

field.name: FTM2SYNCBIT
field.description: FTM2 Hardware Trigger 0 configure by software

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No effect to FTM2;\t this allows the hardware trigger options to function as expected. See SOPT4[FTM2TRG0SRC]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: If TRIG0 is enabled, this refreshes the FTM2CNTIN and all buffered registers of the FTM2 (must write 0 first then write 1); this masks the hardware trigger

field.name: CARRIER_SELECT
field.description: Carrier frequency selection for FTM0/2 output channel

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1_CH1 output provides the carrier signal for Timer Modulation mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LPTMR0 prescaler output provides the carrier signal for Timer Modulation mode

field.name: FTM0OCH0SRC
field.description: FTM0 Ch0 PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH0 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 0 PWM/OCMP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH0 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 0 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH1SRC
field.description: FTM0 Ch1 output PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH1 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 1 PWM/OCMP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH1 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 1 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH2SRC
field.description: FTM0 Ch2 PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH2 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 2 PWM/OCMP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH2 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 2 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH3SRC
field.description: FTM0 Ch3 PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH3 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 3 PWM/OCMP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH3 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 3 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH4SRC
field.description: FTM0 Ch4 PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH4 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 4 PWM/OCMP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH4 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 4 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM0OCH5SRC
field.description: FTM0 Ch5 PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH5 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 5 PWM/OCMP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0CH5 pin is the output of FTM0 channel 5 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM2OCH0SRC
field.description: FTM2 Ch0 PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2CH0 pin is the output of FTM2 channel 0 PWM/OCMP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2CH0 pin is the output of FTM2 channel 0 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: FTM2OCH1SRC
field.description: FTM2 Ch1 output PWM/OCMP mode source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2CH1 pin is the output of FTM2 channel 1 PWM/OCMP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2CH1 pin is the output of FTM2 channel 1 PWM/OCMP modulating the carrier frequency, as per CARRIER_SELECT

field.name: LPTMR0
field.description: Low Power Timer Clock Gate Control

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Doze mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash is disabled for the duration of Doze mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0000
enumeratedValue.description: 8 KB of program flash memory, 0.25 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0001
enumeratedValue.description: 16 KB of program flash memory, 0.5 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0011
enumeratedValue.description: 32 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0101
enumeratedValue.description: 64 KB of program flash memory, 2 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: 128 KB of program flash memory, 4 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: 256 KB of program flash memory, 4 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1111
enumeratedValue.description: 32 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Internal 1 kHz clock is source to WDOG
